cards.rules_text:
{UB}, {T}: Create a Potion token with your choice of a ward {1}, flying, or deathtouch counter on it.
{UB}{UB}, {T}: Put your choice of a ward {1}, flying, or deathtouch counter on target Potion you control.
Whenever you sacrifice a Potion with three or more different counter types, transform Maeve, Teahouse Owner.

You may activate the abilities of Potions anytime you could play an instant.

• {2}{U}: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

Whenever a permanent with counters on it leaves the battlefield, you may put those counters on this creature.
